ahrsemulator

Class AHRSOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ahrsemulator.AHRSOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AHRSOutput
extends java.lang.Thread
    Processes data received from the serial port - if the value corresponds to a Euler angle data request,

    it creates simulated roll / pitch / heading data, assembles it into a data packet (the protocol depends on which AHRS model is selected), and sends it to the serial port.

      • AHRSOutput

        public AHRSOutput(gnu.io.SerialPort sPort,
                  ThreadQueue tQ,
                  int ahrsNum,
                  DataObject dObj)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        sPort - The serial port object.
        tQ - The thread object which allows thread-safe communication between this thread and several other objects.
        ahrsNum - This number represents the AHRS model selected.
        dObj - The data object which is used to exchange data between different objects.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • ahrs_Type_1

        public void ahrs_Type_1()
        3DM-GX2 emulator.

        Receives the data packet request - if it's for Euler angles then it generates stabilized roll, pitch, and heading values based on sinusoidal waves - each with different amplitude, phase, and frequency - and outputs the data to the serial port.

      • ahrs_Type_2

        public void ahrs_Type_2()
        3DM-GX4-25 emulator.

        Receives the data packet request - if it's for Euler angles then it generates stabilized roll, pitch, and heading values based on sinusoidal waves - each with different amplitude, phase, and frequency - and outputs the data to the serial port.

      • ahrs_Type_3

        public void ahrs_Type_3()
        3DM-GX3-35 emulator. This module is not complete.

        Receives the data packet request - if it's for Euler angles then it generates stabilized roll, pitch, and heading values based on sinusoidal waves - each with different amplitude, phase, and frequency - and outputs the data to the serial port.

      • ahrs_Type_4

        public void ahrs_Type_4()
        3DM-GX3-25-OEM emulator. This module is not complete.

        Receives the data packet request - if it's for Euler angles then it generates stabilized roll, pitch, and heading values based on sinusoidal waves - each with different amplitude, phase, and frequency - and outputs the data to the serial port.

      • compEulerAngles

        public void compEulerAngles(int i,
                            float rA,
                            float pA,
                            float hA)
        Generates the roll, pitch, and heading values for all of the AHRS models.
        Parameters:
        i - Integer time step.
        rA - Amplitude for Roll sinusoidal equation.
        pA - Amplitude for Pitch sinusoidal equation.
        hA - Amplitude for Heading sinusoidal equation.
